verbose_text: Sr and Si ions significantly down-regulated the expression of hedgehog pathway (IHH, Patched-1, Gli-1) and suppressed chondrocyte metabolic activity related genes (MMP3, MMP13, Adamts-5) within the concentration range of Sr ions 0.25-4 mg/L or Si ions 0.5-8 mg/L.
